resources: GeoQuiz Canberra is the capital of Australia. True False Correct! Incorrect! Canberra is the capital of Australia The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean. The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean. The source of the Nile River is in Egypt. The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas. Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake. Pomona is the Capital of California. //False Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world. // True The Nile River is the second largest river in Africa. //False Mexico City is the capital of Mexico. //True Next Are you sure you want to do this?
